about: Initial Master Data is Added in the `master-data.json` File

ams.transactions: Use this to store transactions from savings/current account.
Use this to store transactions related to loans, credit cards, etc.
A type of account for storing gift cards, points, cashbacks, rewards etc. informations.
A typical table for holding information related to share market, populate equity, f&o transactions.
An account dedicated for savings for retirements, like PPF, VPF, NPS, etc.
Use this to track investments/redemptions into insurance
A typical account for management of mutual funds and SIP/STP informations.
Term deposit accounts like FD/RD/etc. can be tracked here.
